title: Complexion
alt: Why do all my attempts at science end with me being punched by Batman? (P.S. benzoyl peroxide soap works great.)
transcript:
I get frustrated trying to judge whether acne creams are having any effect. In the spirit of a controlled trial, I used one on just half my face for a few weeks.
[A graph shows pimples vs. time, with two lines: one remains one steady, and one is declining.]It was cool seeing the effects so clearly, so I got some friends to try different treatments in an impromptu study.
[Cueball looks in a mirror, sees a half-pimpled face, and applies a treatment.][Cueball is talking to Ponytail and Megan, each with some pimples also.]
Cueball: Okay, you try the salicylic acid first.
Ponytail: Wait, we should randomize the trials. Got a coin?Cueball: Okay, call it. Heads, she gets the-
(Off-panel): YOU![Batman runs into frame and punches Cueball. The coin goes flying.]
